page.title: 08OTHER CHURCHES IN CATON
page.content: There are 5 other places of worship in the area.Our Lady Immaculate is a Roman Catholic church and the most recently built-beautiful inside,impressive out. There is a strong Methodist tradition here. Brookhouse Methodist is used for a sunday school with a weekly service. Every week a different preacher from the circuit visits the chapel.The Littledale Methodist Society meets at Pott Yeats farmhouse.There are 24 members who pay and a congregation of 25.They hold Camp Meetings twice a year in June.Caton Baptist Church celebrated its hundredth birthday on the 7th June 1985.The Congregational Church is now used as the Y.M.C.A youth club in Caton.Each week over 400 of an adult population of 2200 attend services and The Church plays an important part in the life of the village,especially among the young.
